name: Your X has applied for a CO as a sole applicant
body:
Case reference number: ((reference number))

Dear ((first name)) ((last name)),

Your ((partner)) has applied for a conditional order as a sole applicant. This is the document that says the court does not see any reason why you cannot ((isDivorce??get a divorce))((isDissolution??end your civil partnership)).  

This is because you did not confirm the application for a conditional order so the application could not continue jointly. 

This means you will not have to confirm later steps in the application. You will still receive email notifications and you can still check progress by signing in to your account: ((signin url))

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
subject: Your ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership))
